attributes.action: Ban public calls for a boycott of stores or products directed at any race of people as it is racism.
attributes.additional_details:
I see people calling for a boycott of Israeli stores and products (including a live petition) and it is disgusting and antisemitic.

Imagine if I called for a boycott of Islamic stores and products because of all the killing in the middle east (state and militant).  There would be an outcry and I would be branded a racist.

This is what this is, racism, and I call on the government to make it illegal to call for a boycott of any stores or products relating to any race of people.
